languages.text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.
languages.original_text: Этот военный орган без остановки вербует мужчин и женщин со всего Империума, чтобы подавлять врагов человечества своей огневой мощью и задавливать их числом.

traits.locale_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humankind with firepower and their endless numbers.
This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humankind with firepower and their endless numbers.
This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.

languages.text: Этот военный орган без остановки вербует мужчин и женщин со всего Империума, чтобы подавлять врагов человечества своей огневой мощью и задавливать их числом.

Diese militärische Einrichtung wird ständig aus dem ganzen Imperium finanziert und rekrutiert männliche und weibliche Kämpfer, um die Gegner der Menschheit mit ihrer Feuerkraft und ihrer schier unendlichen Zahl zu überwältigen.
languages.original_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.

traits.locale_text: Diese militärische Einrichtung wird ständig aus dem ganzen Imperium finanziert und rekrutiert männliche und weibliche Kämpfer, um die Gegner der Menschheit mit ihrer Feuerkraft und ihrer schier unendlichen Zahl zu überwältigen.

languages.text: Cette organisation militaire perçoit une dîme perpétuelle de tout l'Imperium. Elle recrute des combattants pour écraser les ennemis de l'Humanité avec leur puissance de feu et leur nombre infini.
languages.original_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.

traits.locale_text: Dans le cadre de la dîme, ce corps militaire recrute à travers tout l'Imperium des combattants et des combattantes chargés d'écraser les ennemis de l'Humanité grâce à leur puissance de feu et à leur nombre infini.

languages.text: 星界军会从帝国各地源源不断地招募战士，通过强大的火力与数量优势打垮人类之敌。
languages.original_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.

traits.locale_text: 星界军会从帝国各地源源不断地招募战士，通过强大的火力与数量优势打垮人类之敌。

languages.text: この軍事組織は、帝国全土から継続的に徴集され、火力と無限の数で人類の敵を圧倒するために戦う男女を採用している。
languages.original_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.

traits.locale_text: この軍事組織は、帝国全土から継続的に徴集され、火力と無限の数で人類の敵を圧倒するために戦う男女を採用している。

languages.text: Este organismo militar recibe continuamente diezmos de todo el Imperium. Recluta a hombres y mujeres luchadores para abrumar a los enemigos de la Humanidad con su potencia de fuego y sus numerosas huestes.
languages.original_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.

traits.locale_text: Este organismo militar recibe continuamente diezmos de todo el Imperium. Recluta a hombres y mujeres luchadores para abrumar a los enemigos de la Humanidad con su potencia de fuego y sus numerosas huestes.

languages.text: Bu askerî kuruluş, ateş gücü ve ezici çoğunluğu ile İnsanlığın düşmanlarını mağlup etmek için İmparatorluk'un dört bir yanından eli silah tutan erkek ve kadınları sürekli olarak askere alır.
languages.original_text: This military body is tithed continuously from all across the Imperium, recruiting fighting men and women to overwhelm the enemies of Humanity with firepower and their endless numbers.
